All Implemented Interfaces:
javax.accessibility.Accessible, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.event.HyperlinkListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class SimpleHelp
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements javax.swing.event.HyperlinkListener

Simple Help Frame based on JFC JEditorPane.

May someday rewrite using JavaHelp API.

Version:
$Id: SimpleHelp.java,v 1.10 2003/05/30 13:16:07 ian Exp $
